name: Swing (itch) (Jaetriel)
description:
Swing is a small endless hypercasual game where you swing (heh) around the white square platforms and shoot off from one to the other as high as you can, making sure to go fast enough so  that the floor underneath you does not catch up to you. 

All the platforms, walls and collectibles are randomly generated as you continue hopping further and further up.

Controls:

  • you can play it with only one button! Use either your LMB, Spacebar or just a single tap if you're on mobile to launch the ball when it's attached to one of the platforms

I made the game as a side-project in my spare time and I wanted it to be something really simple, which you could play in your downtime just to relax, or maybe on the tram during your commute on your way to work.

I took some initial inspiration and idea from the game "Icy Tower", which I used to play a lot during IT classes in high school to try and beat my friends.

Even though you can play the game and all the major features are done, I am still looking to keep working on updates and new additions, just a few I have in mind for the future:

  • Adding an online leaderboard so you can see how you stack up against other players
  • More obstacles, like spikes and bombs, as well as more collectibles
  • Introducing cosmetics, like different backgrounds and themes for the setting of the game, various sprites or skins you could collect either through in-game achievments of collectibles

Currently, the game is available only on itch.io, but I have plans to release it on mobile( Android first and then possibly iOS as well ) after some more optimizations and fleshing out.
